title: Ryze Q is a skillshot
body:
ITS HAPPENING!

Now nerf no counterplay pierce skillshots *cough* {{champion:103}} Q *cough*

Why? Because the counterplay to that is stepping away from minions.

Then you eat her E.

Look at {{champion:101}} , he has a lengthy channel/cast time on Q to compensate. He's fine!

Similar to  the Ahri case ( when he was strong ): {{champion:236}} Q & W.

ALSO

{{champion:7}} Q.

While you're at it making champions healthy, take a look at this creature. {{champion:92}} 

Ty based rito.
